Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2004...
Traded from San Francisco to Minnesota on 6/1/2006 (Going to SF: P T. Lincecum. Going to MIN: P H. Street)...
Earned first career win on 4/6/2007...
Injured on 5/22/2008 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/26/2009, off Alan Benes (FLA)...
Injured on 9/11/2011 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Minnesota to Toronto on 6/16/2012 (Going to TOR: P H. Street. Going to MIN: P H. Boyd, P A. Wood)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2012, going 3-2, 0.77...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2014, going 4-1, 1.50...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Traded from Toronto to Colorado on 7/31/2016 (Going to COL: P H. Street. Going to TOR: 3B C. Seager, P J. Nelson)...
Traded from Colorado to Baltimore on 1/31/2017 (Going to COL: P R. Hoerner, RF D. Peets. Going to BAL: P H. Street)...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Traded from Baltimore to Chicago (A) on 5/22/2022 (Going to CHA: P H. Street. Going to BAL: 3B E. Breed)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Oakland on 7/3/2022 (Going to CHA: P D. Storen, RF G. Springer, C W. Warren Jr., P J. Quintana, P C. Martin. Going to OAK: P M. Pineda, C T. Blume, CF B. Goodwin, P
H. Street)...
